info.name: Lichess Pieces + Chess Board From Chess24
info.description:
Lichess Pieces + Brown Chess Board From Chess24 (There are 6 board styles)

Choose METAL / PURPLE / PURPLE-DIAG / PINK / NEWSPAPER or IC board theme to activate the board style

Now it works properly with analysis board and puzzles as well 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
